page.title: Our Products
page.subtitle: Cutting-edge hardware solutions for complete vehicle monitoring
page.metaTitle: Vehicle Hardware Products | AI Dashcams, MDVR, GPS Trackers
page.metaDesc: Explore our range of professional vehicle hardware including GPS trackers, 4G dashcams, MDVR systems, and smart displays.

items.title: C08W 4G GPS Tracker
items.description: Professional 4G real-time tracking device with fuel cut-off and IP65 protection.

items.title: C08L Asset Tracker
items.description: Ultra-long standby asset tracker with 3-year battery life and magnetic mount.

items.title: D501 4G DashCam
items.description: Dual-lens cloud dashcam with live streaming and SOS alert function.

items.title: D701 Pro DashCam
items.description: Rugged fleet dashcam with lockable storage and external camera support.

items.title: D401 AI Camera
items.description: Intelligent camera with built-in ADAS & DMS algorithms for driver safety.

items.title: D901 AI Smart Camera
items.description: Multi-channel AI camera system with Blind Spot and Pedestrian Detection.

items.title: D604 AI CarBox
items.description: 8-Channel MDVR Hub with powerful AI processing for centralized surveillance.

items.title: OEM Custom Solution
items.description: Tailored hardware design and manufacturing services for your specific fleet needs
